name: Sea Battle Classic Online
description:
Do you remember playing Sea Battle on paper in your childhood?
Simple widely known game, very easy to play having just a pen, sheet of paper and certainly a friend! Now it’s even easier- you need just your device!

In the game you can find:
- Lovely and nostalgic doodle style graphics
- Quick and dynamic gameplay
- High sociability: playing with the users from all over the world, creating your own account, following friends, chats and discussions!
- One account available with different devices
- 4 different game modes

Place your ships, find an opponent on the Internet, local network or via Bluetooth, sink his ships before he sinks yours and win!!
